description.S1: You recovered Lillian's lost cigarette case.
description.S2: Find her and return the item.

blurb.B1: After retrieving the cigarette case, return to Lillian.
blurb.B2: There are several options for resolving this quest.
blurb.B3: Use Lie 25 to convince Lillian that there was no way to retrieve her cigarettes and that they have been left in the pens.
blurb.B4: This completes the quest and grants 9,000 XP and the Commemorative Cigarette Case as a reward.
blurb.B5: Or, tell Lillian that one has her cigarette case but that she isn't getting it back.
blurb.B6: This irritates Lillian and leads to her turning hostile.
blurb.B7: Or, return the cigarette case to Lillian with no conditions.
blurb.B8: This completes the quest and grants 9,000 XP, 625 bits and the Anarchist's Cookbook as a reward.
blurb.B9: Or, use Persuade 25 to return the cigarette case to Lillian but ask her to put in a good word with her boss, Cassandra O'Malley.
blurb.B10: Lillian will tell the Stranger that Cassandra is pinned in the lower levels by Auntie Cleo guards and will radio ahead to tell her that the Stranger is coming.
blurb.B11: This completes the quest grants 9,000 XP as a reward.
blurb.B12: Or, use Intimidate 45 and taunt Lillian about having the cigarette case,
blurb.B15: completing the quest and granting 9,000 XP and the Commemorative Cigarette Case as a reward.

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: Seriously, don't get yourself killed. It's a nice cigarette case, but it's still just a cigarette case.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I've got some good news. I have the cigarette case you lost.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I don't think there's any way to get your cigarettes out. I'm leaving them there.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Don't plan to. See you later.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm not saying it wasn't a hassle to get. But here it is, safe and sound.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: It occurs to me. If I could get this when you couldn't, I bet you couldn't take it from me.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Well, I've got some bad news, too. I'm going to keep it for my own self.

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: You ain't so bad. Here's something for the trouble.

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: It's been a real long day. You want to do this?

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: It's a shitty cigarette case. I wasn't gonna fight no raptidons over it, and I sure as fuck ain't fighting you.

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: And you came all the way back here to tell me that? When you could've just lit outta here and left me none the wiser?

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: I didn't think so either. Maybe when the raptidons clear out, I'll check back.
